mapper.select: SELECT t.*,f.bmmc,f.zw as RoleName FROM "t_user" as t left join fsga_yw_ryb as f on f.mjbh=t.accountname where accountname=#{UserName}
mapper.update: update t_user set status=#{flag} where accountname=#{UserName}
mapper.select: select * from t_user where accountname=#{UserName} and password=#{Password} and usersystem=1
select count(*) from t_user where accountname=#{Account}
